title: A Cafe on the Nile
description: A historical novel set in 1935 East Africa follows the tribulations of the Mills twins as they venture on an ill-fated safari, Anton and Gwenn Rider, and Olivio Alevado, the dwarf proprietor of the Cataract Cafe+a7. By the author of The White Rhino Hotel. 30,000 first printing.
author: Bartle Bull
